Articles.Content:
There was a weird cloud formation in the Fraser Valley Sunday morning, nicely lit by the rising sun: (sorry for the huge pic)

![egJn46E.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/egJn46E.jpg)

[More pics](https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10153055884077808.1073741956.8475622807&type=3&uploaded=10&hootPostID=fdb98892c295fa40deb2310ec9078a28)

The consensus (aside from aliens and chemtrails) is that it's a cloud formation called a 'fallstreak hole.' I'm thinking it's a jet contrail. Thoughts?

Edit: I forgot the disclaimer, I did not take any of the pics, just linked them from the GlobalTV facebook page

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T05:43:08Z" title="02/24/2015 05:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**

Let's call it the Cloud of the Rising Sun.

There is a cloud in Fraser Valley

They call the Rising Sun

And it's been the subject of many discussion

And I participated in it

> 
> There is a cloud in Fraser Valley
> 
> They call the Rising Sun
> 
> And it's been the subject of many discussion
> 
> And I participated in it

I heard that it has been the ruin of many a poor boy. Are you sure you're not one? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Doesn't look like a contrail to me, too dense. Beautiful shot! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

It's definitively a fallstreak hole. You can see it's falling down in its typical fashion. Those are altocumulus clouds (cirrocumulus are a lot higher and more cutesy) so it makes sense.

It's a very nice photo. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
lol, that's a shadow, silly! look at the position of the sun with the mountains and the clouds!

Even without the Alien spaceship disguised as a cloud (you can't fool me damned aliens!) those would still be stunning pictures.

I'm a cloud nerd ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

> 
> lol, that's a shadow, silly! look at the position of the sun with the mountains and the clouds!

That shadow is made by something, and that something is a fallstreak hole.

> 
> That shadow is made by something, and that something is a fallstreak hole.

And, *Sampa*, the shadows are symmetrical with the cloud and not the mountain(s).

> 
> I heard that it has been the ruin of many a poor boy. Are you sure you're not one? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

That's the House of the Rising Sun. Not the Cloud...

Anyhow, I have no idea what it could be. I'm going with Lajoswinkler on this.

Clouds! Why not? Inspired by ***StrandedonEarth***'s post, I figured we can all share some clouds. So, let's see some clouds! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Here's mine from today.

Close to sunset...

![KIvqSpW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KIvqSpW.jpg)

Looking straight up... chemtrails gone wild? lol

![eBulx3F.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/eBulx3F.jpg)
I've seen those clouds a couple times where I live. Quite crazy! Clouds don't scare me until they turn into tornadoes. *That's* pure horror.

![ZkcVaRy.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZkcVaRy.png)

Scared me for a second. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/ZkcVaRy.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZkcVaRy.png)
> Scared me for a second. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I swear! That isn't what I replied to!

what is going on here

also, clouds.

![IH2UJzG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IH2UJzG.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T02:16:45Z" title="02/24/2015 02:16  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by zekes**

![AHFEq6V.png](http://i.imgur.com/AHFEq6V.png)

It's called "Inspect Element". Check it out sometime!

(Though don't abuse it...)

Those are some interesting clouds.

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ1bl7z5Qv9hkcrD6k9RdM-NtOK3Ij9sw-gHBpTqlENh85lES7WvQ](https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ1bl7z5Qv9hkcrD6k9RdM-NtOK3Ij9sw-gHBpTqlENh85lES7WvQ)

When .... starts to look like this it's time to go. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) This is not photoshopped.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/AHFEq6V.png](http://i.imgur.com/AHFEq6V.png)
> It's called "Inspect Element". Check it out sometime!
> 
> (Though don't abuse it...)

**Would you stop giving me heart attacks?!**

Okay, that *was* a little funny...

> 
> That's the House of the Rising Sun. Not the Cloud...

I don't know... It looks kinda ominous? It COULD have been the ruin of many a poor boy, especially if it turns out it was aliens.

> 
> I don't know... It looks kinda ominous? It COULD have been the ruin of many a poor boy, especially if it turns out it was aliens.

You've got a good point there...

Maybe it blocked the sun and caused an accident?

> 
> what is going on here
> also, clouds.
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/IH2UJzG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IH2UJzG.jpg)

That's a cool pic! Where were you when you took it? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
We don't really need 2 threads of cloud pictures. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Merged.
